channel.title: Euphoric pvp (oldschool pvp)
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/EUPHORICPVPHEADER_zps80bd1c39.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.epp.enjin.com/"]HomePage[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.epp.enjin.com/webclient"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.epp.enjin.com/forum"]Forums[/URL] [B]About us: Euphoric PVP(EPP) is world PVP with certain safe zones such as banks,training zones,boss zones. What we tried to accomplish was a PVP based server but still has bossing,training and a flawless duel arena for the players that get bored of Pking 24/7. We are a completely free GP server which means everything is ECTO-TOKEN based. We have a unique home from other servers and correct combat system(just like runescape 07). Theres tons of small and big features in this Euphoric PvP [/B][/CENTER]
[B] [CENTER]Features: Uncheatable pk point system PkP exchange flawless switches flawless combat system(with clipping) 100% dupe free Ecto-token economy Flawless duel arena Diffrent PVP zones across the map Multi pvp zone Casket system vote4ecto Stable Server can hold 1000 players+
the list goes on.[/CENTER][/B]
[CENTER] little bit of Media [SPOIL][IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/Home_zpse1e07b03.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/healingnpc_zps82bf4a4c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/multiwarning_zps6fe2f8e9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/lowlvltrain_zpsddc7186d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/highleveltrain_zps5be6ed5d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1323.photobucket.com/albums/u591/Toxic-x/teleoptions_zpsec47c55c.png[/img] [/CENTER]

[CENTER]

[B]About us:
Euphoric PVP(EPP) is world PVP with certain safe zones such as banks,training zones,boss zones. What we tried to accomplish was a PVP based server but still has bossing,training and a flawless duel arena for the players that get bored of Pking 24/7.
We are a completely free GP server which means everything is ECTO-TOKEN based. We have a unique home from other servers and correct combat system(just like runescape 07). Theres tons of small and big features in this Euphoric PvP
[/B][/CENTER]

[B]
[CENTER]Features:
Uncheatable pk point system
PkP exchange
flawless switches
flawless combat system(with clipping)
100% dupe free
Ecto-token economy
Flawless duel arena
Diffrent PVP zones across the map
Multi pvp zone
Casket system
vote4ecto
Stable Server can hold 1000 players+

the list goes on.[/CENTER][/B]
